nodes.text: Shootout at BG-RT's Tavern and Spirits

A shootout occurred at BG-RT's Tavern and Spirits sometime during the Imperial Era, where several bounty hunters attempted to eliminate cyborg human Beilert Valance. Prior to the shootout, bounty hunter Xonr entered the cantina and tracked down Valance with the intent to kill him for breaking the Bounty Hunter Code and stealing bounties from him, alongside several other bounty hunters. In reality, Valance had lured all of them to the cantina. He began the shootout by killing Xonr first, then proceeded to kill every bounty hunter in the vicinity. After the shootout, Valance and the cantina's patrons raised a glass.
